display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=AaLfw8EDMHEQ7kNvwGbeYVw&_nc_oc=Adlr4o4ayjbHhgeKcujpVILbAnUVVthiqeO1aW2YTfMXANiqjwft9cQ3B4Yed1Bau84&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qi7eOJVC6aUUb1dPApmaGw&oh=00_AfpvlVXpeCD8gNsS5b2kOs2XmvtSMZltI3VyxPqmENS7XA&oe=69678696)


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=93bj9reOPYYQ7kNvwHPUwRp&_nc_oc=Adm0EP3eIx2ug18kJVKttVb1URkQep5VDEdqfl5euv_Iv9aeo8KPnburyYG4CNG-jns&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qi7eOJVC6aUUb1dPApmaGw&oh=00_Afrj9elyFW3aRF0fQ-vJmNDogWBi4mOKT_cE1MW8YgJ-8A&oe=696792AC)



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=I7ZG5xGk-bIQ7kNvwHAUSWL&_nc_oc=AdlyyEAhPvGoj9uQnJtnSOIdYQxAwwbKd7UNOVDALVxKpivAiVhk_3ZFTCJ-u7NALCE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qi7eOJVC6aUUb1dPApmaGw&oh=00_Afo0w76sCArqiPTKBbRJmfdGMn-sVyIcb5Ubi57LcFiVwg&oe=69677E32)

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ZNVCpPD4H08Q7kNvwEnhJjS&_nc_oc=Admg8vbROsPL-EbmsyMCDsjcbdSS6Ytk02MF3Me9T80I_vqd77PeO7ry5vyby82WldY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=qi7eOJVC6aUUb1dPApmaGw&oh=00_Afrncr-9lIG9xNKJeXmYMcn7wV9WRyd54JBZj34zSPyvFQ&oe=6967804C)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
